_meanings:
(Originally a 
combination of {#na#} and {#nu#}, now used as a 
separate word) A particle implying:

{@--5@} It is used in 
propitiatory expressions in the sense of
‘pray’, ‘be pleased’; {#nanu mAM prApaya#}
{#patyuraMtikaM#} <ls>Ku. 4. 32.</ls>

{@--7@} In argumentative discussions
{#nanu#} is frequently used to head an
objection or advance a contrary
proposition (generally followed by
{#ucyate#}); {#nanvacetanAnyeva vfScikAdiSarIrARi#}
{#acetanAnAM ca gomayAdInAM kAryARIti#} 
{#ucyate#} <ls>Ś. B.</ls>
